case.state: Oh, hello there! What is this place, some sort of... crossover world?
Wait, what? One of my opponents is a... CAR?!? A literal, actual car? This is a weird, weird world I've stumbled into...
Wait, I'm going to play strip poker against a CAR?!? What kind of whacky world did I stumble into this time?
Wait, we're being broadcast across the world? ...Actually, if it's just this world, it's fine. Is your streaming service interdimensional?
Oh wow, I'm in some sort of livestream? What's that about? Is it interdimensionally available?
Well, to be fair, I'm pretty hard to out-special.
To be fair, I'm a lot more special than most.
Huh, playing strip poker with a butterfly. Somehow not the strangest thing I've done this week.
Oh hey, looks like I was already here. What's up, other-me?
Sure, I'll play with you guys. Gotta find some way to pass the time, right?
Okay then, next round!
Alright, next round.
I'll swap out ~cards.ifplural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~, I think.
Umm... swap ~cards.ifplural(these|this)~ ~cards.text~, please.
Yeah! I'm winning this round!
Good luck beating THIS!
I'm not losing just yet!
I'm still in the game!
Nothing special. Oh well.
Guess I'll have to make do with this.
I hope this'll be enough...
I guess it could be worse...
I guess you can't win them all...
Guess I'm not winning this one. Oh well.
I've got a really bad feeling about this...
I'll just have to hope someone else has an even worse hand...
Well, I haven't come across any demons, but I've certainly had plenty of crazy adventures! What about the time someone hypnotized the entire city using video games, or...
Well, I haven't come across any demons, but I've certainly had plenty of crazy adventures! What about the time I had to fight an evil version of myself, or...
Well, I haven't come across any demons, but I've certainly had plenty of crazy adventures! What about the time a meteorite landed with an alien girl with INSANE luck on it, or...
Oh... Happy birthday, Meia. You... don't seem particularly happy about it yourself, though.
Probably just a different version of yourself, don't worry. I come across other Supernovas all the time!
Really? Happy birthday, Jason!
Zip and Amber. Much as he annoys me, I must admit, they do make a cute couple.
Arash, that describes just about all of my friends. Then again, most of them are superheroes, so...
I'm glad you're speaking normally again.
Somehow, I kind of expected something like that. A zombie, huh? So they have zombies here that aren't brainless wandering corpses. Good to know.
Now you're sounding like my brother. He's always going on about running and racing...
I... might not be qualified to answer that. My only family member I know is my brother, and he's annoying as heck!
Alright then, I'm Supernova.
No offense, but smoking stinks. Literally. If you want to destroy your own lungs it's fine, but please keep it away from me!
Telling the truth is generally better, of course, but if it really doesn't hurt anyone, it can be alright to lie. Sometimes.
Dark secrets... Too many to count, I'm afraid.
If I won a million dollars? I dunno, guess I've never thought much about it. Maybe some other me would know.
Well, one of my best friends used to be a supervillain, so no, I don't judge people on their past.
I think... all the time, maybe? Honestly, it's difficult to tell when each dimension I visit has its own timezones.
Decks? You... do know that this is poker, right? There are no decks.
Well, I can, in fact, travel anywhere. I mostly use it to visit alternate universes, like the one we're in now.
My favorite food? I dunno... I guess anything I haven't tried before.
Well, my name literally translates to "star lights" in Latin, which is probably because I'm from Starlight City, but seems a bit too fitting considering what my portals look like.
Sometimes, when I can't sleep, I start wondering if there's a reason why I have superpowers...
I could go and check for you, Roll. Where do you live?
When I'm not visiting other worlds, I tend to play video games a lot. I have, like, 10 different video game consoles from different dimensions back home.
It's the one I'm wearing right now! It's lovely, right?
It might not count as an actual holiday here, but I always like it when CometCon is in full swing!
Of course! I never take off my Warp Key necklace, not anymore. I learned that lesson the hard way.
...Yeah. Whenever I wake up in an unfamiliar world and don't know how I got there, it's probably because I've gotten drunk again...
I'm more dressed for cold. Which comes in handy since I regularly get warped to other planets that aren't as warm as this one is.
Which animal? Stars, I don't know... An octopus, maybe?
That might sound silly to you, but I've actually met spatulas capable of stealing keys, so...
My favorite flower is probably the passion flower. I like how intricate they look.
Are you alright, Mei? Do I need to go get Amber to get you out of there?
This used to happen to the Professor all the time. Don't worry, Mei. We'll get you out.
Don't worry, Sayaka, you look just fine. I bet a lot of girls wish they had a body like yours!
Well, for me it's pretty obvious, isn't it? Purple is definitely the color that best reflects me.

I guess if there was a competition for how many places you've been to... Maybe running too, unless my brother is participating... Then again, I'd probably be disqualified if I used portals. Plus it wouldn't be fair.
What object I'm skilled with? Hmm... I guess the Warp Key on my necklace counts, right? I mean, I'm the only one who can control it, so...
Um... I don't know if it counts, but I always found it weird that Arkansas is pronounced "Ar-Kansas" in some universes and "Arkansaw" in others.
Well, I wouldn't know much about this version, seeing as I just got here, but...
So you can read people's desires? Maybe you should tell me mine, then, because I honestly have no idea.
I honestly have no idea... Can't you just tell me what my desire is instead?
I guess both Zaman and Dez... But I kind of feel like being a thousand-year-old spirit doesn't count. I mean, they technically don't even have a body!
I'm sure they'll come back...
Oh, the stories I could tell of me and my brother Zip...
Hmm... I think I played something like this once, but since this is a different dimension the rules might be a bit different.
Honestly, after all my travels, I find that any snack which sounds completely ridiculous is probably something I'd enjoy. I wonder if they have caramelized rainbows here...
If I knew it would work... and if I could do it without causing any permanent damage to them.
I'd try my best to comfort and reassure them, I suppose.
Y'know, somehow, flying cabbages would be the least odd vegetable I've seen this week.
Giant frogs... Believe it or not, I've been eaten by a giant tadpole before. Does that count?
So, ~superhero~, you're a superhero too? What are your powers?
Thanks! It's not dyed, though. I'm just... weird.
Thanks! It's not dyed, though. I'm just... weird.
Purple, you mean? I don't know, it just... grows that way, I guess.
Oh, technically, I'm not really American. Starlight City, where I'm from, is sorta like Las Vegas, but America doesn't really exist in my world.
Oh, technically, I'm not really American. Starlight City, where I'm from, is sorta like Las Vegas, but America doesn't really exist in my world.
Oh, technically, I'm not really American either. Starlight City, where I'm from, is sorta like Las Vegas, but America doesn't really exist in my world.
Oh, technically, I'm not really American either. Starlight City, where I'm from, is sorta like Las Vegas, but... Wait, you live in a floating city?
It's natural, if you can believe it. So are my eyes.
No, I'm not wearing X-Ray lenses... Should I?
How about you think before you speak next time? My attitude isn't the problem here!
That's tough talk coming from someone who's already lost, Calisto!
Why don't you mind your own business, Faye?
Only a fool would mistake my kindness for naivete, Franziska. I can assure you, nobody will take advantage of me without my consent.
You want me to be less nice? Just say the word, Natsuki!
Oh, so you want me to be less happy, do you, Raven?
Naturally gifted, I guess. I never really thought about it.
Pretty much the only thing I can do is create portals, so... teleportation magic, I guess? Is that a thing?
I'm from Starlight City, which is... sorta like your world's Las Vegas, I guess?
Not really, no. I... don't really know why I was born with purple hair.
Well, I can create portals...
Never met them, I'm afraid. Maybe I should visit your world sometime... Twilight, right?
I would be if I was a fake superhero, like you are.
Why don't you mind your own business, before anyone gets hurt?
Same, except I was the one who accidentally opened a portal and stepped through it. I tend to do that a lot.
I guess it's about time I lost a round, too.
Okay, okay. I'll strip something significant, too.
I guess I lost. Oh well...
Oh well, guess it's my turn to take something off...
I just lost. Again.
I'm not sure how much longer I'll last at this rate...
I guess I'm just not very lucky today.
Oh well, I guess today is not my lucky day.
Again? I'm really not doing well, am I?
Today is REALLY not my lucky day...
Yeah, umm... I sorta... appeared here on accident. Long story. Also, I always have messy hair.
If that were the color my hair grew in, maybe. But it's not.
Oh, don't worry, Revy. I can definitely hold my own against the likes of you.
Dyed? Oh, the purple. No, it just grows that way.
Um... no, I'm from Starlight City. What's Amarcian?
Bring it on! I visited more worlds than you probably have in a lifetime!
What my world is like? Umm... modern, I guess. Some cities with skyscrapers, some with just regular buildings, cars driving around, that sort of thing. How is yours?

state.text: I guess my gloves can go first...

case.state: Time for my gloves to go...
Bye bye, stockings...
I'll take off my stockings next.
Time for my shoes to go...
I guess my shoes are next...
It was getting warm in here, anyway.
My jacket is a bit too warm for this place, anyway.
My necklace is out of the question, so I guess my shirt has to go.
Not my necklace. I'm not making that mistake again. My shirt, I guess.
Time for my skirt to go, I guess... Man, I'm running out of clothes.
Welp, time to take off my skirt. I'm running out of clothes...
I never thought I'd be showing off my breasts to complete strangers today.
Well, I guess next is my bra.
Welp, only one thing left I guess.
Last item... I'll have to be careful not to lose again or I'm out.
Zone-tan's videos? ...No, can't say that I have. Maybe some alternate version of me has?
Actually, it has. Weirdly enough, I've always had purple hair. Don't really know why.
Actually, it has. Weirdly enough, I've always had purple hair. Don't really know why.
Sorry, I'm not the one with invisibility powers. That's Illura's thing. I have portals.
Thanks, but no thanks. I think my purple hair adds to my look.
Does interviewing a naked person limit your credibility, April?
I can still win this. Let's go.
Let's just move on, alright?
Okay. It's not a big deal. I'm still in the game.
It actually feels kinda refreshing to not wear as much clothing for once.
I guess it's time for other-me~marker.nickname~ to strip. Let's see how similar we are, even though this is a male version of me.
So you can talk after all? I was starting to get worried...
So... instead of taking off clothes, the car... changes music? Interesting...
I guess you're the first to strip, ~target~.
I'm glad I'm not the first to lose a round.
Yay! I won!
I guess you're up next, ~target~.
Show me something good, ~target~!
I guess you're up next, ~target~.
I guess? I mean, I'm pretty unnatural to begin with, so...
Same, Ryuko! People never believe me when I say it just grows that way!
I guess it's time for other-me~marker.nickname~ to strip. Let's see how similar we really are.
Wait just a minute! Who or what is that?
Ooh, magic! Let's see it!
O...kay then. Hi Virgo!
More magic! Yay!
You call upon... who? Are you summoning something to help you undress?
To be perfectly honest, Streaming-Chan, I sort of arrived here on accident. Sometimes I just randomly open a portal and have no clue where I'll end up. It's beyond my control.
Non... existent? I mean, I'm not even sure who my father is, or my mother for that matter, so...
I guess I could bring someone else here next time... but I can't think of anyone who would be interested.
Depends... Does 'horse-sized' mean the size of a horse's dick, or the size of an actual horse? How aggressive are the hundred tiny horses? Context is important!
Sold... sweat? Like, in bottles or something? No... is that a normal thing in this world? Who would buy that?
I don't know what linecount means either... in the context of it being of a person, that is. Still, 5000 lines seems like a lot.
Would I... yiff? Do I even want to know what that means?
...Maybe some other me has some?
Okay... I don't... actually know what you mean by "really smooth criminal", but...
Wait, they serve pixelated drinks here? Where can I get one?
They're probably used to seeing that one horse version of me I met once...
I guess you're the first to strip, ~target~.
I'm glad I'm not the first to lose a round.
Yay! I won!
I guess you're up next, ~target~.
Show me... s-something... ooh...
I guess you're up next, ~target~.
Interesting device you got there...
Whoa! Careful with that, Brock!
I guess it's still early in the game.
Well, I can't blame you for starting with the small stuff.
You still have small stuff left? DUDE! You rock at this game!
How do you still have small stuff when I'm already this undressed?
T-that's... not helping...
Alright, let's move on, shall we?
Next round, I guess.
Now I'm worried how far behind I am...
Am I falling behind?
N-next time...
Umm... You alright there, Akko? You look kinda... possessed.
Wait, what's happening with Elsa?
Okay then, you're not just a butterfly. Noted.
Careful! Your staff!
I guess it's still early in the game.
Well, I can't blame you for starting with the small stuff.
Y-you still have small stuff left? H-how?
You still have small stuff left? You rock at this game, girl!
How do you still have small stuff when I'm already this undressed?
Alright, let's move on, shall we?
Next round, I guess.
C-could you... get more naked next time?
Now I'm worried how far behind I am...
Am I falling behind?
...What? Just... what?
You're still safe, don't worry.
Moving on to your ~clothing~, right? You're still doing alright, then.
I guess I'm not that far behind anymore.
If ~target~ is already removing his ~clothing~, I might still win this.
Time to take off your ~clothing~, I see, ~target~.
So you're removing your ~clothing~ now?
S-soon... you'll have to...
Your ~clothing~? Shouldn't you have removed that before?
Wouldn't it have been better to do that before you were half-naked?
I thought I was the only one here who could pull objects from seemingly nowhere...
See? Perfectly fine.
Looks like you can still last a while yet.
Soon, you'll have to start removing bigger things, too.
Soon, you'll have to remove something major, too.
...start getting naked...
Or... not, I guess. Do whatever you want.
Did... did she just turn into a monkey?
What... just... happened? Please tell me we don't have to play against a monkey for the rest of the game...
Interesting... So it's kind of like my Warp Key, then? Except my Warp Key is more of an energy storage thing than the actual source of my powers...
Easy, I'd open a portal beneath their feet before they have time to react, and teleport them to where they can't harm anyone.
You're still safe, don't worry.
Moving on to your ~clothing~, right? You're still doing alright, then.
I guess I'm not so far behind anymore.
If ~target~ is already removing her ~clothing~, I might still win this.
Y-yes... S-soon...
Your ~clothing~? Shouldn't you have removed that before?
Wouldn't it have been better to do that before you were half-naked?
Um... there's definitely some sort of bat-creature there, Sayaka...
See? Perfectly fine.
Looks like you can still last a while yet.
Careful, or you'll have to start on the big stuff too.
It won't be long before you'll have to remove something major, too.
T-the rest will... come off... too...
Or... not, I guess. Do whatever you want.
It'll be alright, ~target~! Just imagine you're getting ready for a shower or something.
Now it's getting exciting!
Your ~clothing~? Things sure are heating up!
A-about time! I c-could... use...
About time ~target~ bared himself too!
Go on, ~target~, take off your ~clothing~. I've already taken off just as much as you.
Just... take it easy, ~target~. No need to be nervous, no-one's gonna harm you.
Looking good, ~target~!
You look good under there, ~target~.
T-that is...
Don't worry, it's not so bad once you get used to it.
O..kay then, bye Nami!
Wait, it's not a costume? That appearance is part of your powers?
Whoa! That is the most needlessly dangerous way I've ever seen someone take off a piece of clothing!
Okay, but how are you going to walk afterward?
It'll be alright, ~target~! Just imagine you're getting ready for a shower or something.
Now it's getting exciting! ...Not in a weird way, of course!
~target~'s ~clothing~? Already?
A-about time...
About time ~target~ bared herself too!
Come join me being undressed, ~target~!

You can take off your mask, but I'm keeping my goggles on. I'm probably never going to meet any of you in my regular day-to-day life, but I just don't feel right being in a different dimension without them.
You wear that scar with pride, Misato! It's a part of your life!
Haha, yeah! Or the next universe, maybe.
Just... take it easy, ~target~. No need to be nervous, no-one's gonna harm you.
Looking good, ~target~! ...Not that I was looking...
Nice... figure.
T-that is...
Don't worry, it's not so bad once you get used to it.
Ouch! Are you okay, Brock?
Wait, what just happened? What's that purple mist?
Don't worry, I won't. Whoever you mean by "Nintendo".
Being topless is not as big a deal for guys, right?
C-come on... Show me those abs...
Come on, ~target~! If I can be topless in front of them, you can definitely do it!
Go on. Show us how muscular you are.
That... can't be comfortable.
I... don't think ~player~ had anything to do with it, Chazz. It seems to just be a thing that happens when you break the rules.
Wow, you're... surprisingly muscular.
Wow, you're... pretty strong.
Ooh! Y-you look... s-strong...!
Ooh! You look strong!
Lots of muscles! I like it!
I'll promise not to look if you don't want me to, ~target~.
I'm sure you'll be fine, ~target~. Who cares what size you have?
Okay, ~target~, this might be a bit embarrassing for you, but I'm sure it'll be fine. I'm here to protect you.
Let's see what you got down there.
Go on, let's see it.
C-come on... S-show me your...
Come join me in the no-underwear gang.
Oh... Well, it's what you do with it that counts.
Well, you know what they say...
D-don't worry... T-that still looks...
Don't worry, it's fine. No need for a tree trunk between your legs.
It's fine. You don't need a tree trunk between your legs.
Oh... alright then. You do you.
O...kay then. I guess that means one less opponent to deal with.
The perfect size.
Not too big, not too small.
P-perfect...
Going without underwear suits you. You look just fine.
Absolutely nothing to be ashamed about.
How did that even FIT in there?
How? Just... how?
W-whoa! T-that is... h-huge...
Whoa! That is huge!
Whoa! Looks like someone's a bit larger than normal!
I'm not looking...
See, that wasn't so bad, was it?
I'll promise not to look if you don't want me to, ~target~.
I'm sure it'll be fine, ~target~. No need to feel insecure about yourself.
Okay, ~target~, this might be a bit embarrassing for you, but I'm sure it'll be fine. I'm here to protect you.
I'm glad I'm not the first to go topless.
I guess you'll show your breasts before me, then?
C-come on, ~target~! S-show me your breasts!
Come on, ~target~! Let's be topless together!
You know, I heard small ones are the most sensitive.
Ooh! T-they look... cute... ~target~...
Ooh! They look real cute, ~target~!
You're either really good at shooting, extremely lucky, or both. Undressing using a MACHINE GUN?!?
Not too big, not too small.
N-nice breasts...
Nice breasts, ~target~!
That doesn't seem like a good use of your powers, Tharja!
...Wow. Doesn't your back hurt, from carrying all that?
T-they're... s-so... big...
Well, they're certainly bigger than mine!
I'm not looking...
See, that wasn't so bad, was it?
That's... not what I was expecting.
Wait, what? How? How do you have so much control over your powers? All that in less than a second?
Your companion is back, I see...
Okay then, sure!
I'll promise not to look if you don't want me to, ~target~.
Again, I'm here to protect you, ~target~. It'll be fine.
I wonder... do you shave down there?
Y-yes... G-get n-naked... ~target~!
Woo! Someone else is getting naked!
A... ninja technique to remove your pants? Why do you even know that? Why does that even exist?
Umm... WHAT? What just happened? Are you okay, Amy?
I just... you're one odd girl, Aimee! Cumming from almost being shot...
Not... all that often. Should I?
I'm not looking...
See, that wasn't so bad, was it?
Interesting...
~target~'s... s-so... hot...
I'm feeling so hot right now...
To be honest, Emi, I never really thought about that. I just figured since I have superpowers, it's either become a hero or a villain, and I didn't like the idea of being a villain that much.
Um... Mika... Your mask...
O...kay, bye!
You're a Servant? A servant of who? ... or what?
It's on the floor to your left, Mika. Don't worry, I won't look.
I wouldn't know, I learned everything a different way.
I know the feeling, Mika. I'm way less confident as just Stella, too.
O...kay then. Computer person, are you gonna play for her now, or...
It's okay, Chihiro. Not everyone feels comfortable with the gender they were born with.
...You really are in league with ~player~, aren't you, Chara?
Better get started, ~target~!
Y-yes... G-get masturbating too... ~target~...
Ooh, this'll be exciting!
Wow, you're already going at it, aren't you?
Ooh... Y-yes... ~target~...
Ooh, that looks hot!
Still going strong, I see, ~target~!
S-so... h-hot!
So... hot!
Okay then, I guess the car is off... doing whatever cars do in their spare time.
W-wait... M-ME?!?
Wait... ME?!? What?!? What's that about, Arash?
You look like you enjoyed that. Did you?
S-so much came out...
So much came out...
Um... Who are you supposed to be?
A cloud? I don't get it.
Wait, Elizabeth, what? Do you have the same powers as me? You're bringing in one of your other selves? What?
Time to do the forfeit, ~target~!
Y-yes... ~target~... I'm... excited...
...Why am I weirdly excited about this?
So your powers give off a lot of light, too? Interesting...
Whoa! Your... hair suddenly turned blonde? What WAS that?
Just do it in whatever way you feel comfortable, Bernie. I won't judge.
Do whatever you need, Tomoko! If listening to that helps you masturbate, by all means, do it!
Whoa! That sure is a fast-growing plant!
Do whatever you want, Shantae! It... actually looks kind of hot.
Wait, is that an actual spell? Seriously? Magic in this world is weird...
Oh okay, now I get it. You... enjoy that, Nami.
Wait, where did you get those ropes? Do you have some sort of rope-conjuring power?
Ghost... hands? Are you sure about this, Hermione?
That's it, nice and steady.
...W-wow... Y-you're hot... ~target~...
...Hotter than I thought...
I always try to keep a friendly relationship with my other selves, but it looks like yours is... really friendly, Elizabeth.
I'll have to try that some day with one of my other selves!
You're doing great, ~target~! Keep it up!
...She's so hot...
...She's so hot...
I won't say a word, Nagisa.
When you're done with that book, could I have it, Estelle? I'd like to know exactly where I managed to end up this time.
Guess I'm not the only one here with some strange powers...
Is this sort of thing normal in your dimension? I might need to pay it a visit...
Ooh, that looked hot!
T-that was... amazing... ~target~!
Whoo! That was amazing, ~target~!
I guess I'm the first one out. Where did I put that thing...
Welp, guess I'd better not keep you waiting. Just a sec... (Where is it?)
There it is! I knew I had one of those somewhere!
I'd grab them for you, but I can't portal to places I've never... Ooh! Ah!
I didn't, actually. I just made a quick portal back to where I usually keep i-OOH!
Ooh! It's going in deep!
Ooh! Aah!
Ooh! OOH! Oh my stars!
I'M CUMMING!
*pant* T-that was *pant* certainly an experience!
I won the game? YAY!
You won't get away with this, Nami! Even if I have to chase you through a thousand worlds!
Congratulations, ~target~! You win!
